LaunchTemplateSpecification.description: An object representing a launch template specification for AWS EKS Nodegroup.

Taint.description: An object representing a Taint specification for AWS EKS Nodegroup.

ScalingConfig.description: An object representing a auto scaling group specification for AWS EKS Nodegroup.

RemoteAccess.description: An object representing a remote access configuration specification for AWS EKS Nodegroup.

MaxUnavailable.description: The maximum number of nodes unavailable at once during a version update. Nodes will be updated in parallel. This value or maxUnavailablePercentage is required to have a value.The maximum number is 100.

MaxUnavailablePercentage.description: The maximum percentage of nodes unavailable during a version update. This percentage of nodes will be updated in parallel, up to 100 nodes at once. This value or maxUnavailable is required to have a value.

AmiType.description: The AMI type for your node group.

CapacityType.description: The capacity type of your managed node group.

ClusterName.description: Name of the cluster to create the node group in.

DiskSize.description: The root device disk size (in GiB) for your node group instances.

ForceUpdateEnabled.description: Force the update if the existing node group's pods are unable to be drained due to a pod disruption budget issue.

InstanceTypes.description: Specify the instance types for a node group.

Labels.description: The Kubernetes labels to be applied to the nodes in the node group when they are created.

LaunchTemplate.description: An object representing a node group's launch template specification.

NodegroupName.description: The unique name to give your node group.

NodeRole.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role to associate with your node group.

ReleaseVersion.description: The AMI version of the Amazon EKS-optimized AMI to use with your node group.

RemoteAccess.description: The remote access (SSH) configuration to use with your node group.

ScalingConfig.description: The scaling configuration details for the Auto Scaling group that is created for your node group.

Subnets.description: The subnets to use for the Auto Scaling group that is created for your node group.

Tags.description: The metadata, as key-value pairs, to apply to the node group to assist with categorization and organization. Follows same schema as Labels for consistency.

Taints.description: The Kubernetes taints to be applied to the nodes in the node group when they are created.

Version.description: The Kubernetes version to use for your managed nodes.
